item.title: Use Ansible to resolve IT issues Part 3
item.author: jlozada2426@protonmail.com (Jonathan Lozada De La Matta)
item.description: After successfully being able to add/remove users and install Cloudera Clusters, I needed to tag on patching systems. This is a hot item that everyone should be aware and should be able to do some down time for.
